scenario_text.value:
So you ran into a fake Agumon, Takuma? Did he
say mean things to you?

Yeah. Things the normal Agumon wouldn’t dream
of saying.
Oh, and he attacked me once.

Yeah, somehow. That was the most danger I’ve
seen here.

Wow... Who knows what I’d do if Syakomon took
a stab at me.

Don’t sweat it. I was alone then, but now
we’ve got Agumon with us.
He’ll save us if anyone attacks you, Miu.

Takuma, let’s go get Syakomon back, and make
it snappy!
